com.shephertz.app42.paas.sdk.android.social

Class SocialService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.shephertz.app42.paas.sdk.android.App42Service
      • com.shephertz.app42.paas.sdk.android.social.SocialService

  • public class SocialService
extends App42Service
    Connect to the User's multiple social accounts. Also used to update the status individually or all at once for the linked social accounts.

        public Social linkUserFacebookAccount(java.lang.String userName,
                             java.lang.String accessToken,
                             java.lang.String appId,
                             java.lang.String appSecret)
                               throws App42Exception
        Links the User Facebook access credentials to the App User account.
        Parameters:
        userName - - Name of the user whose Facebook account to be linked.
        accessToken - - Facebook Access Token that has been received after authorization.
        appId - - Facebook App Id.
        appSecret - - Facebook App Secret.
        Returns:
        The Social object
        Throws:
        App42Exception

      • getFacebookFriendsFromAccessToken

        public Social getFacebookFriendsFromAccessToken(java.lang.String accessToken)
                                         throws App42Exception
        This function returns a list of facebook friends of the specified user using a given authorization token. To get the friend list here, user needs not to log into the facebook account.
        Parameters:
        accessToken - - Facebook Access Token that has been received after authorization.
        Returns:
        Social Object
        Throws:
        App42Exception

      • getFacebookFriendsFromAccessToken

        public void getFacebookFriendsFromAccessToken(java.lang.String accessToken,
                                     App42CallBack callBack)
                                       throws App42Exception
        This function returns a list of facebook friends of the specified user using a given authorization token. To get the friend list here, user needs not to log into the facebook account in async mode.
        Parameters:
        accessToken - - Facebook Access Token that has been received after authorization.
        callback - - Callback object for success/exception result.
        Throws:
        App42Exception

      • facebookPublishStream

        public App42Response facebookPublishStream(java.lang.String accessToken,
                                  java.lang.String name,
                                  java.lang.String filePath,
                                  java.lang.String message)
                                    throws App42Exception
        Share binary files on your facebook wall with custom message.
        Parameters:
        accessToken - - Facebook Access Token that has been received after authorization.
        name - - name of the file which has to be share.
        filePath - - file path of your local machiene.
        message - - Message which has to be post with Link.
        Returns:
        App42Response Object
        Throws:
        App42Exception

      • facebookLinkPostWithCustomThumbnail

        public App42Response facebookLinkPostWithCustomThumbnail(java.lang.String accessToken,
                                                java.lang.String link,
                                                java.lang.String message,
                                                java.lang.String pictureUrl,
                                                java.lang.String name,
                                                java.lang.String description)
                                                  throws App42Exception
        Share your link on facebook based on custom image and message.
        Parameters:
        accessToken - -Facebook Access Token that has been received after authorization
        link - - Link which has to be share on facebook.
        message - - Message which has to be share with Link.
        pictureUrl - - Your Thumbnail image url which you want to share on facebook.
        name - - Name of your File.
        description - - Description about your link.
        Returns:
        App42Response Object
        Throws:
        App42Exception

      • facebookLinkPostWithCustomThumbnail

        public void facebookLinkPostWithCustomThumbnail(java.lang.String accessToken,
                                       java.lang.String link,
                                       java.lang.String message,
                                       java.lang.String pictureUrl,
                                       java.lang.String name,
                                       java.lang.String description,
                                       App42CallBack callBack)
                                         throws App42Exception
        Share your link on facebook based on custom image and message.
        Parameters:
        accessToken - -Facebook Access Token that has been received after authorization
        link - - Link which has to be share on facebook.
        message - - Message which has to be share with Link.
        pictureUrl - - Your Thumbnail image url which you want to share on facebook.
        name - - Name of your File.
        description - - Description about your link.
        callBack - - -Callback object for success/exception result.
        Throws:
        App42Exception
